# Gravity Bow, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 3]], [[3rd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

As *[[Gravity Bow (Spell)|gravity bow]],* but any arrow or crossbow bolt fired from it deals damage as if two sizes larger than it actually is.
